sentences.en: A 10 to 15 percent deviation is considered acceptable.
Air pollution in the city had reached four times the acceptable levels.
sentences.cn: 这座城市的空气污染程度曾高达可接受标准的四倍.

sentences.en: Any solution must be acceptable to all sides.
sentences.cn: 任何解决办法都必须能为各方所接受。

sentences.en: How do we reach an acceptable level of data security?
sentences.cn: 我们如何使数据安全达到令人满意的程度？

sentences.en: It is becoming more acceptable for women to drink alcohol.
sentences.cn: 女性喝酒渐渐被人们接受。

sentences.en: Luxembourg sketched out an acceptable compromise between Britain, France and Germany.
sentences.cn: 卢森堡草拟了一项英国、法国和德国之间都可以接受的妥协方案。

sentences.en: Selling their fans short in such a shabby way is not acceptable.
sentences.cn: 如此过分地怠慢他们的崇拜者令人无法接受。

sentences.en: Students who achieve an acceptable standard will progress to degree studies.
sentences.cn: 达到一定程度的学生可以进一步攻读学位。

sentences.en: Taxation is not popular in principle, merely acceptable in context.
sentences.cn: 征税基本上是不受欢迎的，在一定情境中才勉强为人接受。

sentences.en: The air pollution exceeds most acceptable levels by 10 times or more.
sentences.cn: 大气污染程度超出了普遍认可的标准10倍或更多。

sentences.en: The soil contains 30 times the acceptable level of radioactivity.
sentences.cn: 这片土壤受到了高于标准30倍的辐射.

sentences.en: The terms of the contract are acceptable to us.
sentences.cn: 我们认为这个合同的条件可以接受.

sentences.en: The use of the split infinitive is now generally acceptable.
sentences.cn: 分裂不定式的用法现在已被广泛接受.

sentences.en: This technique is becoming more refined and more acceptable all the time.
sentences.cn: 这种技术变得越来越完善，越来越受人欢迎。

sentences.en: This validation process ensures that the data conforms to acceptable formats.
sentences.cn: 这一确认过程可以保证这些数据符合认可的格式。

sentences.en: Who ever thought people would see Arsenal as the acceptable face of football?
sentences.cn: 谁会想到人们会认为足球之道可如阿森纳队呢？

sentences.en: Yogurt is a perfectly acceptable substitute for cream in cooking.
sentences.cn: 酸奶是烹饪用的特别受欢迎的奶油替代品.

words.tran_cn: 公认的；录取的；可接受的；已承兑的
承兑的；易接受的；赞同的
接受；接纳；[金融] 承兑；赞同
[金融] 承兑人；接受者；接收器
接受（accept的过去式及过去分词）
接受；同意；承担（责任等）（accept的ing形式）
接受；承认；承担；承兑；容纳

phrases.tran_cn: 可接受的性能；合格性能
合格质量，可接受的质量
（尤指某可疑或不道德事物的）可容忍（或引人）的一面

trans.tran_en: good enough to be used for a particular purpose or to be considered satisfactory
